2. Word of the Day: Gesundheit | Merriam-Webster
   URL: https://www.merriam-webster.com/word-of-the-day
   Description: www.merriam-webster.com | Build your vocabulary: get a new word every day from Merriam-Webster dictionary. Learn the meaning, history, and fun facts about Gesundheit.
   Content: Word of the Day: Gesundheit | Merriam-Webster Est. 1828 Word of the Day : September 26, 2025 gesundheit play interjection guh-ZOONT-hyte Prev Next What It Means Gesundheit is an interjection used to wish good health to one who has just sneezed. // I sneezed three times in a row, and my coworker called " gesundheit !" from the next cubicle. See the entry > gesundheit in Context "Personally, I did not like my husband's sneezing into his hand, so I stopped saying ' gesundheit ' whenever he did that. He now almost always sneezes into his elbow." — The Toronto Star , 27 Jan. 2024 Build your vocabulary! Get Word of the Day in your inbox every day.
